resources.string: "I've read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy."
"I've read and agreed to Facemoji Privacy Policy."
"I've read and agreed to Kika Privacy Policy."
Get instant access to your smart voice assistant
Double press AI button to complete custom tasks
Press and hold AI button to talk to Mi AI
Press AI button to view Mi AI shortcuts

"In order to improve the services provided to you, the mobile network operator of your choice may upload your personal data and the info about this device to its servers using Wi-Fi networks or mobile data connection. This information will only be used for statistical purposes in order to improve the quality of the services and provide more personalized content. This information won't be used to identify you personally and won't be disclosed to third parties."
Swipe up to enter the system
Keep holding down two fingers to enable accessibility.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, verify Mi Pay transactions, or to sign in to apps and services.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, or to sign in to apps and services.

You turned on TalkBack by pressing the screen with 2 fingers for more than 10 seconds. TalkBack provides voice feedback for people with visual impairments. If you turned it on by accident, tap the Cancel button, and then double tap the screen.
No network connection. View the Privacy Policy for this keyboard at %s.
"Choose the default keyboard that you'll use for writing messages, notes, and just about everything else. Note that you can install other third-party keyboards later."
"You don't have an internet connection. View the Privacy Policy at %s."
"You don't have an internet connection. View the Terms of Service at %s."
Receive personalized ads based on your behavior data
MIUI will select the best moment to install updates
Get curated images and stories delivered to your Lock screen daily. Terms and conditions apply.
Allow apps to access your location
Usage stats which help us locate and solve issues may contain your personal info
Help us improve our products and services by sharing your usage stats with us. View details
(Including POCO Launcher Privacy Policy and User Agreement)
" View the selected keyboard's Privacy Policy."
"Couldn't find SIM card. Make sure SIM card is properly installed and you have sufficient funds on your balance."
Allow connecting to mobile data networks? If you do, the SIM card you insert will be used to connect to mobile data networks.
To insert your SIM card, read the instructions that came with your device.
"SIM card couldn't connect to the network"
"Your SIM card couldn't connect to a valid carrier network. Make sure you have sufficient funds on your balance and try to connect again."
Make sure you know how to use full screen gestures before selecting this option.

"Your privacy is very important to us. Read our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to understand what information we collect, how we use it, and what choices are available to you.r r You must agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy before you can use MIUI. %s and Mi Account components will connect to the internet and acquire your location."
, Self-registered service, Fused Location Provider, HTMLViewer
Mi services, Mi SIM activation services, Mi Cloud, Find device, Home screen, Game center, MAB, MIUI Daemon and MSA system components, Translation services, Quick apps, App vault, statistics, Mi Link
"r r You must agree to Facemoji Privacy Policy before using this feature."
"r r You must agree to Kika Privacy Policy before using this feature."
Mi AI allows you to use voice controls, but it consumes more power (+1% every hour).
"You'll be able to use Mi AI in these cases:r 1. When the screen is on.r 2. When you're listening to music with your screen off."
Say \"Mi AI\" into your phone. Mi AI will recognize your voice and will be able to control your device.
